results.description: Thailand's former world champion Ratchanok Intanon is cleared of doping after it is found she ate contaminated meat.
results.title: Ratchanok Intanon: Former world champion cleared of doping

results.description: Djarum Foundation dan Komisi Perlindungan Anak Indonesia (KPAI) akhirnya berdamai terkait dengan Audisi Beasiswa Bulutangkis. Kedua pihak menyatakan menyadari perlunya proses pembibitan atlet bulutangkis nasional.
results.title: Djarum Foundation dan KPAI berdamai, audisi beasiswa bulutangkis berlanjut

results.description: PV Sindhu becomes first Indian player to win the prestigious badminton World Championship.
results.shortTitle: India celebrates Sindhu's world badminton glory
results.title: PV Sindhu: India celebrates badminton World Championships gold

thumbnail.altText: PV Sindhu is one of India's most popular sports stars

results.description: Pasangan Hendra Setiawan/Mohammad Ahsan meraih gelar juara dunia untuk ketiga kalinya setelah menundukkan ganda putra Jepang, Takuro Hoki/Yugo Kobayashi, pada laga final Kejuaraan Dunia Badminton 2019 di Basel, Swiss, Minggu (25/08).
results.shortTitle: Hendra/Ahsan raih gelar juara dunia badminton 'untuk rakyat Indonesia'
results.title: Kejuaraan Dunia Badminton: Hendra/Ahsan raih gelar juara ketiga kali 'untuk rakyat Indonesia'

results.description: Jack Shephard retains his Para-badminton World Championship title after winning Sunday's SS6 final in Basel, Switzerland.
results.title: Para-badminton World Championships: Jack Shephard wins final to retain title

results.description: Jack Shephard is into the Para-badminton World Championship SS6 final but Krysten Coombs is knocked out in quarters.
results.shortTitle: Shephard into Worlds final but Coombs out
results.title: Para-badminton World Championships: Jack Shephard into final but Krysten Coombs knocked out

thumbnail.altText: Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs stand back to back

results.description: Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs remain on course to meet in the final of the World Para-badminton Championships.
results.shortTitle: Friends still on course to meet in final
results.title: Para-badminton World Championships: Shephard and Coombs still on course to meet in final

thumbnail.altText: Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs stand back to back

results.description: Chris and Gabby Adcock are out of the Badminton World Championships as all three remaining British pairs are eliminated in the last 16 in Basel.
results.title: Badminton World Championships: Chris and Gabby Adcock out as Britain's interest ends

results.description: Great Britain's Marcus Ellis and Lauren Smith reach the third round of the World Badminton Championships.
results.shortTitle: Ellis and Smith progress at Worlds
results.title: World Badminton Championships: Marcus Ellis and Lauren Smith progress

thumbnail.altText: Britain's Marcus Ellis and Lauren Smith

results.description: England's Chris and Gabby Adcock comfortably reach the third round of the World Badminton Championships.
results.title: World Badminton Championships: Chris and Gabi Adcock progress

results.description: Rajiv Ouseph's final tournament ends in defeat against Jonatan Christie and Kirsty Gilmour also loses at the World Championships in Basel.
results.shortTitle: Ouseph ends career with defeat in Basel
results.title: World Badminton Championships: Rajiv Ouseph ends career with defeat in Basel

results.description: Meet Britain's Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs, the world number one and two going head to head to compete at the Tokyo 2020 Paralympics.
results.shortTitle: From best friends to on-court foes
results.title: World Para-badminton Championships: Jack Shephard & Krysten Coombs battle for Paralympic qualification

thumbnail.altText: Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs stand back to back

results.description: Meet Jack Shephard and Krysten Coombs, the SS6 world number one and two in Para-badminton. They're best of friends but fierce rivals on the court, and only one of them can represent Great Britain at the Tokyo 2020 Paralympics.
results.title: Friends and foes fighting for a Paralympic place

results.description: Scotland's Kirsty Gilmour loses out to Pai Yu Po of Chinese Taipei in the final of the Russian Open in Vladivostock.
results.shortTitle: Gilmour beaten in final at Russian Open
results.title: Kirsty Gilmour: Scot loses final at Badminton's Russian Open

thumbnail.altText: Scotland's Kirsty Gilmour is the top seed in Russia

results.description: Dalam waktu hampir satu dekade belakangan, secara keseluruhan, tim nasional bulu tangkis Indonesia masih berada di belakang tim China dan Jepang. Prestasi tim putri Indonesia yang rendah, menahan Indonesia pada posisinya.
results.shortTitle: Badminton: Ketinggalan jauh dari China dan Jepang, mampukah Indonesia kembali raih kejayaan?
results.title: Indonesia Open: Sisakan ganda putra, mampukah Indonesia saingi China dan Jepang dalam tahun-tahun mendatang?

results.description: Former European badminton champion Rajiv Ouseph wants to see more British Asian athletes at Tokyo 2020 after ruling himself out of a third Olympics.
results.shortTitle: English number one Ouseph to retire
results.title: Rajiv Ouseph: Former European champion to retire but wants more British Asians at Tokyo 2020

thumbnail.altText: Rajiv Ouseph celebrates at the 2016 Olympics

results.description: Manx competitors have come second in the medals table, with a total of 29 gold, 22 silver and 17 bronze.
results.shortTitle: Isle of Man runners-up at Gibraltar 2019
results.title: Island Games: Isle of Man runners-up at Gibraltar 2019

results.description: Marcus Ellis and Lauren Smith cause a shock at the European Games by beating British rivals Chris and Gabby Adcock in the badminton mixed doubles final.
results.shortTitle: Ellis & Smith beat Adcocks to win gold
results.title: European Games: Marcus Ellis & Lauren Smith beat Chris and Gabby Adcock to win gold

results.description: Kirsty Gilmour says her third European silver medal "hurts a little bit more" as Denmark's Mia Blitchfeldt wins in straight sets in Minsk.
results.shortTitle: Gilmour hurting as Blichfeldt takes gold
results.title: European Games: Kirsty Gilmour's final loss 'tough to take'

results.description: Great Britain win two gold medals and two silver medals on the penultimate day of the European Games in Belarus.
results.shortTitle: GB win badminton & boxing golds in Minsk
results.title: European Games: GB win badminton & boxing gold medals in Minsk

thumbnail.altText: Great Britain's Marcus Ellis (left) and Chris Langridge celebrate with their gold medals after winning the men's doubles badminton final in Minsk
